snippet: The attack intensified tensions in the city as a dwindling but dedicated core of protesters continues to block access to a number of major intersections and government buildings.
abstract: Attack on antigovernment protesters in Bangkok, most likely with a grenade, kills one person and injures more than 30, raising tensions in the city as a dwindling but dedicated core of protesters continues to block access to Thai government buildings and major intersections.
lead_paragraph: The attack intensified tensions in the city as a dwindling but dedicated core of protesters continues to block access to a number of major intersections and government buildings.

headline.main: Blast at Antigovernment March Raises Tensions in Bangkok
headline.print_headline: Blast at Antigovernment March Raises Tensions in Bangkok
